job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Totogi is on the lookout for tech trailblazers ready to dive headfirst into the next wave of software development with AI as their co-pilot. Think less routine, more innovation. Here, AI isn't just another tool-it's your sidekick, elevating your coding skills to superhero status. Imagine conjuring code like magic, predicting and squashing bugs before they even emerge, and delivering groundbreaking solutions that leave customers in awe.

   This role is all about pushing the boundaries of what's possible in software development. You'll be instrumental in crafting AI tools that clarify complex concepts, employing the latest in technology to upgrade your coding skills to superhero-level. Your objective is to elevate our enterprise software solutions, ensuring they lead the market in innovation, user satisfaction, and overall experience.

   Totogi values driven, curious, and innovative individuals ready to explore new horizons. We're charting a course towards a new way of working, with AI as our guide. Are you up for the challenge?

   What you will be doing

     * Implementing AI from the ground up in projects, enhancing everything from feature development to problem-solving.
     * Crafting AI-generated summaries to streamline knowledge across products, domains, or corporate intelligence, boosting team efficiency.
     * Showcasing the power of AI in improving software development processes, emphasizing its role as a booster, not a replacement.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Dwelling on manual debugging. With AI, identify and resolve issues swiftly, leaving outdated methods behind.
     * Getting caught in the management trap. Concentrate on what you do best-coding and creating innovative solutions-rather than getting sidetracked by managerial tasks., * Drive the integration of AI into our development process, setting new standards in innovation, efficiency, and customer satisfaction for Totogi's product suite.
job_details.full_text:
AI-First Software Engineer, Totogi (Remote) - $60,000/year USD

Totogi is on the lookout for tech trailblazers ready to dive headfirst into the next wave of software development with AI as their co-pilot. Think less routine, more innovation. Here, AI isn't just another tool-it's your sidekick, elevating your coding skills to superhero status. Imagine conjuring code like magic, predicting and squashing bugs before they even emerge, and delivering groundbreaking solutions that leave customers in awe.

   This role is all about pushing the boundaries of what's possible in software development. You'll be instrumental in crafting AI tools that clarify complex concepts, employing the latest in technology to upgrade your coding skills to superhero-level. Your objective is to elevate our enterprise software solutions, ensuring they lead the market in innovation, user satisfaction, and overall experience.

   Totogi values driven, curious, and innovative individuals ready to explore new horizons. We're charting a course towards a new way of working, with AI as our guide. Are you up for the challenge?

   What you will be doing

     * Implementing AI from the ground up in projects, enhancing everything from feature development to problem-solving.
     * Crafting AI-generated summaries to streamline knowledge across products, domains, or corporate intelligence, boosting team efficiency.
     * Showcasing the power of AI in improving software development processes, emphasizing its role as a booster, not a replacement.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Dwelling on manual debugging. With AI, identify and resolve issues swiftly, leaving outdated methods behind.
     * Getting caught in the management trap. Concentrate on what you do best-coding and creating innovative solutions-rather than getting sidetracked by managerial tasks., * Drive the integration of AI into our development process, setting new standards in innovation, efficiency, and customer satisfaction for Totogi's product suite.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on the use of AI as a tool to enhance existing software development processes and productivity, rather than on the core development, fine-tuning, or deployment of AI models themselves. Phrases like 'AI as their co-pilot,' 'elevating your coding skills,' 'crafting AI tools that clarify complex concepts,' and 'emphasizing its role as a booster, not a replacement' suggest a focus on AI-assisted development rather than specialized AI engineering roles like ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer. There is a lack of specific technical details regarding model building, training, or deployment of generative models, which are central to the GenAI Engineer profile. Similarly, while it mentions enhancing software development, it doesn't emphasize the data-driven algorithmic work characteristic of an ML Engineer. The role appears to be more about leveraging AI for general software engineering productivity.

job_tasks.justification: The role is described as 'AI-First Software Engineer' and focuses on 'elevating our enterprise software solutions,' 'feature development,' and 'coding and creating innovative solutions,' which are core to software development.
The description emphasizes enhancing software development processes and creating solutions, aligning with the goals of software development.
job_tasks.phrase: pushing the boundaries of what's possible in software development

job_tasks.justification: The core activities involve implementing AI to enhance feature development and problem-solving within the software development lifecycle.
job_tasks.phrase: Implementing AI from the ground up in projects, enhancing everything from feature development to problem-solving.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves using AI to improve the software development process itself, which falls under the umbrella of software engineering practices.
job_tasks.phrase: Showcasing the power of AI in improving software development processes

job_tasks.justification: The description explicitly states the focus is on coding and creating innovative solutions, which are fundamental software development activities.
The role aims to integrate AI into the development process to improve innovation and efficiency in the product suite.
job_tasks.phrase: Drive the integration of AI into our development process
